item.description:
Raw Pot-luck: all those attending are requested to bring a raw, organic, unprocessed, non-animal based (vegan with no honey) ready- to-serve dish for 8 - 12 people. Please bring a typed or neatly printed recipe to display next to your dish ideally with copies for people to take with them if they so choose.

Ideas for Raw Vegan (without honey) dishes to bring:
1. organic leafy green salad
2. raw recipes available online:
www.rawnewenglandcommunity.com/phpbb2
www.living-foods.com/recipes
goneraw.com/recipes
www.rawsacramento.net/recipes.htm
www.rawfoodlife.com/Raw_Resources/Raw_Food_Recipes/raw_food_recipes.html www.shazzie.com/raw/recipes
www.rawganique.com/recipes.htm
3. most raw food books have raw recipes; and
4. organic fruit salad.

Learn about the Enneagram nine personality styles, which one is your
dominant type and how to relate well to each type. Herb acts out the
9 types with props and hats so be prepared for fun and insights.
Herb has led 2000 Enneagram public workshops and company trainings
for the last 18 years and has been a psychotherapist working with
individuals,couples and families for 30 years. www.herbpearce.com.
herb@herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737. $10 donation.

Posted by Mara www.rawyum.com
item.name: Potluck/Talk: Herb Pearce - Enneagram
